name: Wyndham Stuttgart Airport Messe
description: Directly beside Stuttgart Airport and 200 metres from Stuttgart Trade Fair, this hotel offers a gym and restaurant. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. Air-conditioned rooms and suites with floor-to-ceiling, soundproofed windows are provided at the Wyndham Stuttgart Airport Messe. All rooms include a minibar and safety deposit box. A breakfast buffet is available at the Wyndham Stuttgart Airport Messe. In warm weather, guests can eat outside on the terrace. Drinks are served in the Lounge Bar. S-Bahn trains take you to Stuttgart city centre in 25 minutes. The A8 motorway is just 100 metres away from the Wyndham Stuttgart Airport Messe.

name: Arcotel Camino
description: Offering soundproofed rooms with internet, spa facilities, and a restaurant, this 4-star superior hotel is just a 5-minute walk from Stuttgart Central Station. WiFi is available in all areas. The ARCOTEL Camino Stuttgart provides air-conditioned rooms and apartments with flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. Fresh apples are provided. The private bathroom includes an infra-red lamp. The hotel’s spa area features a Finnish sauna, rain forest shower, and steam room. Guests can also book massages and keep fit in the gym. The onsite Weissenhof restaurant serves fine wines and Swabian specialities with a modern touch. The Scala bar has a wide choice of drinks and 2 flat-screen TVs with Sky channels. Private parking is available at the Camino ARCOTEL. The Königstraße shopping street and Klinikum Stuttgart Hospital are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Azenberg
description: This modern 4-star hotel enjoys a peaceful location, just a 15-minute walk from Stuttgart Main Station, and free WiFi. Hotel Azenberg offers an idyllic garden and a wellness area with a swimming pool. Rooms at Hotel Azenberg Stuttgart are warmly furnished with bright colours. All rooms include satellite TV and a private bathroom. A full buffet breakfast is available each morning in the Azenberg’s stylish restaurant. Snacks and drinks are served all day in the bar with open fireplace, or on the hotel terrace. The Azenberg is set in leafy surroundings, just 1.5 km from the Kräherwald Hills and 2 km from Killesberg Park. Children are welcome to enjoy the playroom. If reserved in advance, guests receive free entrance during the day at the spa which includes a sauna, steam bath, Kneipp basin and a relax area. On-site parking is available at Hotel Azenberg. The number 43 bus stops beside the hotel, providing regular connections to Stuttgart city centre.

name: Jaz in the City Stuttgart
description: The lifestyle hotel Jaz in the City Stuttgart is directly next to the Milaneo shopping centre. The Königstraße is 1.5 km away and the Stadtbibliothek Underground Station is 150 metres from Jaz in the City Stuttgart. The stylish design hotel was opened in early 2018. Guest rooms comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bath and a desk. The rooms include a private bathroom with a chic rain shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. The modern Restaurant Rhythms Bar & Kitchen features dry aged meat and steaks. The trendy Wolfram Bar & Terrace with rooftop terrace offers cocktails, wines, exclusive whiskey and gin selection snacks with views over Stuttgart on Balinese sky beds. Work out in the gym, which is open 24 hours a day, and relax in the welness area with its 2 saunas and a steam room.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Stuttgart Messe & Congress
description: The Mövenpick Hotel Stuttgart Messe & Congress is within walking distance of Messe Stuttgart, ICS Stuttgart and the planned airport ICE train station. Stuttgart Airport and the subway are also just 200 meters away. Experience Swiss hospitality in a unique 4-star hotel designed according to the visions of the Italian star designer Matteo Thun.accorhotels.com

name: Mövenpick Hotel Stuttgart Airport
description: Experience Swiss hospitality and first-class service in an exceptional environment. The unique location of the 4-star superior Movenpick Stuttgart Airport hotel offers excellent connections to Stuttgart Airport, the Stuttgart fairgrounds and the ICS Stuttgart. The exclusive business hotel inspires with unique interior design by Matteo Thun.accorhotels.com

name: Le Méridien Stuttgart
description: Renowned for its German wineries, medieval castles and baroque palaces, Stuttgart is a long-time royal residence and home of Mercedes and Porsche, whose museums are fascinating landmarks. In between those cultural hotspots, Le Méridien Stuttgart is located near the city center, the Old Castle and the New Castle. Our family friendly hotel boasts elegant guest rooms and suites, as well as a spacious wellness area featuring an immersive pool, sauna area and a fully equipped gym. The green parklands of the Schlossgarten opposite the hotel is ideal for an iconic stroll or jog. Across the park, Stuttgart's central street, the Koenigstrasse invites guests for shopping and entertainment. Our new restaurant Kleinschmeckerei serves premium cuts of the finest meat. Extensive Brunch buffet on Sundays and creative cocktails at the Bar Lillet complement the hotel's invitation to savor the good life in Stuttgart. Host your next meeting at our business hotel and let our team help you plan your successful event.Marriott

name: Pullman Stuttgart Fontana
description: Business guests swear by the Pullman Stuttgart Fontana. The Neue Messe conference center, Stuttgart Airport and the city center/main station and the Musical theaters are near. In the directly adjacent city park, green spaces invite you to stretch your legs. Also for work meetings! In addition to five meeting rooms flooded with daylight, the Pullman Stuttgart Fontana is comfortable, modern and effective.accorhotels.com

name: Steigenberger Graf Zeppelin
description: This luxury hotel is situated in the centre of Stuttgart, directly opposite Stuttgart Central Station. The Königstraße shopping street, the National Gallery Stuttgart, the Schlossplatz and various other city sights are all within walking distance of Steigenberger Graf Zeppelin. It offers an international and regional restaurant, a rooftop spa, free WiFi and soundproofed rooms with a flat-screen TV. The modern rooms and suites come with a seating area, desk, and stylish bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided. The spacious spa area, which is 500 m² in size, features a sauna, a steam bath and a fitness room. Guests can also book massages. The Steigenberger’s restaurant Zeppelino'S offers high quality international cuisine from vegan to Steaks. In addition, Swabian specialities are available in the Zeppelin Stüble restaurant. The Davidoff Lounge offers cigars, and guests may choose from a variety of cocktails at the Zeppelin Bar. Mercedes-Benz Arena is 5.3 km from Steigenberger Graf Zeppelin while Porsche-Arena is 5 km away.

name: Relexa Waldhotel Schatten
description: The Waldhotel Schatten has a rich and exciting history, dating back to 1783. It became famous far beyond the region for an attraction that raised the pulse of all racing fans: The Solitude racetrack, with an S bend right in front of the hotel that was nothing short of notorious. Today the Waldhotel offers the perfect setting for a pit stop la relexa: peaceful, comfortable and relaxing. Even as you enter the lobby you will be welcomed by a synthesis of the traditional and modern, which is continued throughout the hotel. Our 138 rooms, including 12 suites, have been individually designed with an eye for pleasing details. No two rooms are alike, but all rooms naturally offer bath or shower/WC, hairdryer, TV, radio and minibar as standard features. We also have non-smoking rooms for our guests, on request.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hilton Garden Inn Stuttgart NeckarPark
description: A short walk from the Mercedes Benz Museum and the Cannstatter Wasen, this hotel offers free Wi-Fi internet access and spacious rooms. Opened in 2006, it is a 10-minute drive from Stuttgart city centre. All rooms at the Hilton Garden Inn Stuttgart NeckarPark feature a large flat-screen TV, small fridge, microwave and tea/coffee maker. The Hilton Stuttgart’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Lounge Bar is furnished with leather sofas and armchairs, and offers a variety of drinks including cocktails. Guests at the Hilton Garden Inn Stuttgart NeckarPark enjoy free use of the spa with Finnish sauna, bio sauna, steam room, luxury showers and fitness area. The Neckar Park Rail Station is a 15-minute walk from the Hilton. Stuttgart Central Station can be reached directly in 15 minutes by car from here. Concert and convention halls such as the Hanns-Martin-Schleyer Halle, the Porsche Arena and the Mercedes Arena (home of VfB Stuttgart football team) are situated nearby.

name: Hotel Stuttgart 21
description: This quietly located, 3-star hotel in north Stuttgart is just a 5-minute drive from the Königstraße shopping street and train station. The Best Western Hotel Stuttgart 21 has bright, modern rooms with private bathrooms and free Wi-Fi. The Best Western provides a big breakfast buffet for an extra fee. The 24-hour hotel bistro and bar serves snacks and drinks throughout the day. Guests are welcome to use the Best Western's Finnish sauna throughout their stay. The Best Western Stuttgart 21 is a 10-minute walk from the Friedhofstraße U-Bahn (underground) station. It quickly connects you to the city centre, main train station, and airport.

name: Waldhotel Stuttgart
description: Enjoying a peaceful forest location, this 4-star superior hotel is just a 15-minute drive from Stuttgart Central Station. Rooms with flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and tea/coffee facilities are offered. Regional and international cuisine is served in the Waldhotel’s stylish restaurant. Guests can relax with a drink in the hotel’s bar. Bright, elegant rooms with minibar and work desk are available. All rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, and some rooms a balcony or a terrace. Stuttgart Waldhotel features a spa centre with gym and sauna, as well as a large ballroom. An on-site tennis court is provided, and other sports courts are nearby. Guests can visit the Stuttgart TV Tower, just a 5-minute walk from the Waldhotel Stuttgart. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from the A8 Motorway, and on-site parking is free.
